info.name: KeeFox Dark Theme
info.description: A Dark Theme for the Firefox KeeFox addon. This works especially well for Firefox dark themes like FT DeepDark. Note that this theme is not actively developed. I am posting this here so that other KeeFox users can have awareness and easy access to this dark theme.
info.additionalInfo: Credits for the theme creation to the GitHub user NoXPhasma on the KeeFox Github issue thread here
